Package library.domain

Class Media

java.lang.Object
library.domain.Media
Direct Known Subclasses:
CD
public abstract class Media extends Object
Abstract base class representing a generic media item in the library.

This class provides shared attributes and behaviors for all media types such as:

  • Title
  • Creator (author, artist, etc.)
  • Unique ID
  • Borrowed state

Subclasses such as Book and CD implement specific borrowing rules by overriding:
  • getBorrowDays()
  • getDailyFine()
This abstraction is part of the Sprint 5 extension (Mixed Media Handling), enabling polymorphism when calculating fines and due dates.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Lojain

    • setBorrowed

      public void setBorrowed(boolean b)
      Sets the borrowed status of the media.
      Parameters:
      b - true for borrowed, false for returned

    • getBorrowDays

      public abstract int getBorrowDays()
      Returns the number of days this media can be borrowed.
      Implemented differently for each media type:
      • Books → 28 days
      • CDs → 7 days
      Returns:
      borrowing duration in days

    • getDailyFine

      public abstract int getDailyFine()
      Returns the daily overdue fine for this media type.
      Implemented differently for each media type:
      • Books → 10 NIS/day
      • CDs → 20 NIS/day
      Returns:
      fine amount per overdue day
